description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe defining the PulseAudio sound server for an embedded Linux build. It specifies metadata, dependencies, configuration options, packages, license information, and related scripts for building and installing PulseAudio with various modules and features.

methods.name: set_cfg_value
methods.description: Sets a configuration value in a specified file, using sed, and verifies the change.

methods.name: do_compile:append
methods.description: Appends additional commands to the compile process, enabling autospawn for root if configured.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Performs additional installation steps, like copying configuration files.

methods.name: populate_packages:prepend
methods.description: Populates PulseAudio modules and libraries into package split templates based on filename patterns.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}-server
methods.description: Post-install script to update volatile files if needed.
